name: solid-rock

effect.x-y: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.

short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.
